altTitles.ja: 婦警さんと暗殺さん

description.en: The assassin with a scary mug has arrived in the town where an air-headed policewoman with a strong sense of justice lives! Although his target is a businessman, his constant flirting with the policewoman is causing him great trouble! The assassin constantly tries to eliminate the businessman who is in love with the policewoman... and if you look closely, there's a possible love triangle ?! Will the day the assassin can complete his job come?
description.ja: 正義感あふれる(天然)婦警さんの住む町へ、コワモテの暗殺さんがやってきた！ターゲットである実業家さんを暗殺しようとするも、お人よしさがジャマをして、うまくいかないことばかり！それを阻止しようとする婦警さん、その婦警さんに恋心を抱く実業家さん……と、気づけば奇妙な三角関係に!? 予想外の展開に振り回されっぱなしの暗殺さんが、仕事をまっとうできる日はいつ!?

title.en: Bad Boy Who Lies In Love

altTitles.th: ลวงรักร้ายของนายแบดบอย

description.en: Just an ordinary girl who had just started her high school life, but she never thought that something would happen and she ended up getting involved with the most senior naughty guy in school. Plus she was asked to be her boyfriend. And what will his life be like after this?
description.th: แค่เด็กสาวธรรมดาคนนึงที่เพิ่งเริ่มต้นชีวิต ม.ปลาย แต่ไม่คิดเลยว่าจะเกิดเรื่องจนต้องมาพัวพันกับรุ่นพี่หนุ่มแบดสุดฮอตในโรงเรียน แถมยังถูกขอให้คบเป็นแฟนอีก แล้วชีวิตฉันหลังจากนี้จะเป็นยังไงต่อละเนี่ย
description.pt-br: Apenas uma garota comum que tinha acabado de começar sua vida no ensino médio, mas ela nunca pensou que algo aconteceria e ela acabou se envolvendo com o cara mais velho e safado da escola. Além disso, ela foi convidada para ser seu namorado. E como será a vida dele depois disso?

title.en: Motto mo Kirawareteiru Saikyou no Akuyaku ni Tensei

altTitles.ja: 最も嫌われている最凶の悪役に転生

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as the Most Hated Villain

description.en:
Arima Seto is a 23-year-old part-time worker. One day, he is reincarnated as Lobelia Crowley, the most vicious villain in the popular smartphone game Arcadia Fanrasy!

He tries to do good deeds to avoid the catastrophe ending, but he can't stop using his sharp tongue...!?
description.ja:
23歳のフリーター・瀬戸有馬。ある日人気スマホゲームの最凶の悪役、ロベリア・クロウリーに転生してしまった……！　

破滅エンドを回避するため善行を積もうとするが、毒舌口調が止まらなくて―!?

altTitles.ja: エナジーガール

description.en:
Once upon a time, there was a make-up artist, whose talent drew crowds, and his beauty was second to none. But he had a terrifying secret, —he was a straight man.   
Once upon a time, there was a closet gay that pretended to be a straight man, he was formerly the god of esports, and currently a superstar.   
He is explosive, likes to silently curse at people in crowded places. Then, what will happen when a male make-up artist “tangles up” with an explosive idol, just what kind of fireworks will emerge from this drama?  
  
t/n: Fen Dai could refer to black and white powder, cosmetics, but it's also a slang for beautiful young women.

altTitles.ja: サンダ

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

altTitles.ja: 先輩、ちょっといいですか?

altTitles.en: Senpai, Can I Have a Moment?

altTitles.vi: “Senpai, anh có thể cho em một chút thời gian được không?

description.en: A super-sheltered girl, Shiranui Rei, has a lot of things she doesn’t know! She asks her questions to her senior, who is also a library committee member. But sometimes, her questions are hard to answer…!?
description.vi: Cô gái giàu có và được nuông chiều 不知火零(Shiranui Rei) không biết nhiều điều về thế giới xung quanh! Cô thường hỏi những điều không hiểu cho đàn anh của cô ở câu lạc bộ thư viện. Nhưng những câu hỏi của cô đôi khi lại khó trả lời lắm…!?

title.en: A Woman Who Is Too Honest Despite Her Kyoto Dialect

altTitles.ja: 京都弁なのに正直すぎる女

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyoto-ben na no ni Shoujiki Sugiru Onna

altTitles.vi: Cô gái ấy quá trung thực mặc cho giọng thổ ngữ Kyoto của mình

altTitles.en: A Girl Who Is Too Honest Despite Her Kyoto Dialect

altTitles.es-la: Una chica demasiado honesta a pesar de su dialecto de Kyoto

altTitles.ja: ちいかわ なんか小さくてかわいいやつ
なんか小さくてかわいいやつ

description.en: The sometimes happy, sometimes sad, and a tad stressful daily life of "some sort of small, cute creature" known as Chiikawa. Chiikawa enjoys delicious food with bees and rabbits, toils hard every day for the rewards of work, and still maintains a smile.
description.ja:
なんか小さくてかわいいやつ＝通称「ちいかわ」たちが繰り広げる、楽しくて、切なくて、ちょっとハードな日々の物語。

みんなに愛されて、優しくされて、こういう風になって暮らしたい…はずが、周囲には得体の知れない存在もたくさん!?
でも、大好きなハチワレやうさぎたちと、おいしいものを食べたり、労働の報酬でほしいものを手に入れようとしたり、毎日を一生懸命生きる「ちいかわ」の周りは、いつも笑顔で溢れています。

altTitles.ja: 外村探偵社の招かれざる客

altTitles.en: The Troublesome Guest of Sotomura Detective Agency

altTitles.vi: Vị Khách Không Mời Ở Văn Phòng Thám Tử Sotomura

description.en: Matsuda is a private eye who runs his own detective firm, taking on quirky cases centered around the local shopping arcade. He's recently taken on a new roommate (and lover) named Kamiko who is unemployed, ruthlessly horny, and was actually a classmate of his from his past. While the two work together to solve cases, they carry on in what starts as a strictly physical relationship, but which by and by evolves into one that neither wants to lose.

title.en: Danjo no Yujou wa Seiritsu suru? (Iya, Shinai!!)

altTitles.ja: 男女の友情は成立する？（いや、しないっ！！）

altTitles.en: Can a Boy and Girl Friendship Hold Up? (No It Can't)

altTitles.zh: 男女之间真的存在友情吗

description.en:
At a rural junior high school, a man and a woman vowed an eternal friendship. The relationship between the two who became a fateful community toward one dream-two years have passed without any particular progress ...!

　Yuu Natsume, a flower-loving plant boy, and Inuzuka Himari, a girl who hasn't been in love for the first time yet, have been peacefully close friends in the gardening club with only two of them.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54842)
description.ja: 未だに初恋がこない陽キャ女子・犬塚日葵と、花を愛する植物系男子・夏目悠宇はふとしたきっかけで友情に落ちた。 それから２年――相変わらず『親友』をやっているふたりだったが、悠宇がかつての初恋相手と再会したことで日葵と悠宇の関係も変わり出し……？

title.en: Jikan Teishi Yuusha - Yomei 3-ka no Settei ja Sekai wo Sukuu ni wa Mijika Sugiru

altTitles.en: Time Stop Brave - A Game Setting to Save the World in Three Days is Way too Short

altTitles.th: ผู้กล้าหยุดเวลา

altTitles.zh-hk: 停止時間的勇者⸺只能再活三天這種設定對拯救世界來說未免太短了⸺

altTitles.zh: 停止时间的勇者⸺只能再活三天这种设定对拯救世界来说未免太短了⸺

altTitles.ja: 時間停止勇者―余命３日の設定じゃ世界を救うには短すぎる―

description.en:
KUZUNO Sekai was transported to a medieval fantasy game-like world (isekai). He was given a game controller with the ability to stop time and a 3-day countdown timer. Now he has to figure out the mechanics of this game world and clear it in time.

--- 
- The chapters labeled "Nips ver." contain uncensored nipples.
description.fr: KUZUNO Sekai a été transporté dans un monde médiéval de type jeu de fantaisie (isekai). On lui a donné une manette de jeu avec la possibilité d'arrêter le temps et un compte à rebours de 3 jours. Il doit maintenant comprendre les mécanismes de ce monde de jeu et le terminer à temps.
description.ru: Кузуно Секай попадает в средневековый фэнтези-мир вместе с игровым контроллером, с помощью которого он может останавливать время, а также таймером обратного отсчёта, с длительностью в 3 дня. Теперь ему предстоит разобраться в механике этого мира и вовремя пройти его.

title.en: Ryoushin no Shakkin wo Katagawari shite morau Jouken wa Nihon Ichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu koto deshita.

altTitles.ja: 両親の借金を肩代わりしてもらう条件は日本一可愛い女子高生と一緒に暮らすことでした。

altTitles.en: I'm Gonna Live with You Not Because My Parents Left Me Their Debt But Because I Like You

altTitles.zh: 替我父母偿还债务的条件是与日本最可爱的女高中生同居。

altTitles.zh-ro: Tì wǒ fùmǔ chánghuán zhàiwù de tiáojiàn shì yǔ rìběn zuì kě'ài de nǚ gāozhōng shēng tóngjū.

description.en:
The main character, Yoshizumi Yuya, was being pressured into paying off the debt left by his parents who had fled abroad. It was his classmate, Hitotsuba Kaede, chosen as the cutest schoolgirl in Japan, who saved him from this crisis of life and death. However, there was a catch. The condition required to fulfill in return for taking over his debt was — "In return for the loan, you have – to live with me."
“Why did that happen?!”

Yuya's daily life collapsed on this day.

"Yuya-kun. Let’s take a bath together."
"Yuya-kun, please be my hug pillow."
"That’s enough, Hitotsuba-san!"
description.id: Tokoh utama, Yoshizumi Yuya, dipaksa untuk melunasi hutang yang ditinggalkan oleh orang tuanya yang melarikan diri ke luar negeri. Itu adalah teman sekelasnya, Hitotsuba Kaede, terpilih sebagai siswi terimut di Jepang, yang menyelamatkannya dari krisis hidup dan mati ini. Namun, ada motif tersembunyi di balik itu. Syarat yang harus dipenuhi sebagai imbalan untuk melunasi utangnya adalah — “Sebagai imbalan atas pinjaman itu, kau harus tinggal bersamaku.” “Kenapa jadi begitu?!” Kehidupan sehari-hari Yuya runtuh pada hari ini. “Yuya-kun. Ayo mandi bersama.” “Yuya-kun, jadilah bantal pelukku.” “Cukup, Hitotsuba-san!” Kisah cinta komedi romantis yang menggugah antara Hitotsuba Kaede yang cantik namun santai dan Yoshizumi Yuya yang serius dan keras kepala, dimulai sekarang!
description.ja:
第1巻の内容紹介: 糖度300％の同棲ラブコメ
両親が借金3000万を残して海外逃亡…！？追い詰められた吉住勇也の前に、不意に現れたのは社長令嬢の同級生・一葉楓。勇也も密かに憧れていた日本一可愛い女子高生1位に選ばれた楓は、彼女は意外な提案をするが

Dai 1-kan no naiyō shōkai: Tōdo 300-pāsento no dōsei rabu kome ryōshin ga shakkin 3000 man o nokoshite kaigai tōbō…!? Oitsumerareta Yoshizumi Yūya no mae ni, fui ni arawareta no wa shachō reijō no dōkyūsei 一葉楓. Yūya mo hisoka ni akogarete ita nihon'ichi kawaii mesukōsei 1-i ni eraba reta kaede wa, kanojo wa igaina teian o suruga.

title.en: Himegasaki Sakurako wa Kyou mo Fubin Kawaii

altTitles.en: Sakurako Himegasaki is Still Pitiably Cute Today

altTitles.ja: 姫ヶ崎櫻子は今日も不憫可愛い

altTitles.zh-hk: 姬之崎櫻子今天也惹人憐愛

altTitles.en: Himegasaki Sakurako Is Pitiably Cute Today Too

altTitles.ja-ro: Himegasaki Sakurako ha Kyou mo Fubin Kawaii

altTitles.en: Himegasaki Sakurako Is a Hot Mess

description.en: An average romcom told from the perspective of the losing childhood friend. Other things happen as well.

title.en: Kokan Musou ~Kiraware Yuusha wa Mazoku ni Aisareru~

altTitles.ja: 股間無双～嫌われ勇者は魔族に愛される～

altTitles.en: Unparallelled Groin: The Hated Hero is Loved by the Demons

altTitles.zh-hk: 股間無雙～被討厭的勇者卻被魔族所愛～

description.en:
Kantarou, who has ascended to heaven because he is too sick, reincarnates in a different world. Kantarou, who is distorted in character and is a fatty, is disliked even after reincarnating, but notices that a cloudy potion that cures anything from his crotch appears. Moreover, it also has the effect of powering up the demons, and it will be loved by the demons…!? A different world reincarnation fantasy that is unmatched in the crotch!!!
___
**Alt Official Raws:**
- [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/3269754496640214685)
- [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55354)
description.ja: ヌキすぎて昇天してしまった汗太郎(かんたろう)は異世界に転生する。キモデブで性格も歪んでいる汗太郎は転生した先でも嫌われてしまうが、自分の股間から何でも治してしまう白濁色のポーションが出ることに気づく。しかもそれは魔族をパワーアップさせる効果も持っていて、魔族からも求愛されることに……!?股間で無双する異世界転生ファンタジー!!!

description.en:
Huazhi was put to death due to her family's betrayal. A girl who was from a prestigious family a thousand years ago was reincarnated as Huazhi. She tried to live a comfortable life away from betrayals and dark battles... but the family fell apart in an instant, and Huazhi tried reestablish the family using the experiences of his previous life. And then, a man who is attracted to her, like fate, arrives in her unsuccessful life...

Note: This is based on a Chinese novel called The Story of Huazhi which has been adapted into a Chinese drama called, "Blossoms in Adversity."

altTitles.vi: Tụi mình không có hẹn hò

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”
description.pt-br:
"Por que você continua perguntando se estamos namorando? Só estamos de mãos dadas, não estamos namorando!!"
É uma comédia romântica slice-of-life sobre casais que não são realmente casais!

altTitles.ja: バツハレ

description.en: The story begins with the protagonist, Wakou Ichiro, who decides to return home early from work to celebrate his second anniversary with his wife. But, when he opens the door of his house... He finds his wife cheating on him! Although the marriage was short-lived, his life changes again when suddenly, a certain woman appears in front of him?
description.ja: ２度目の結婚記念日。仕事を終えて帰宅した和光市路が目撃したのは見知らぬ男と交わる妻の姿だった──！住み慣れた我が家、幸福な日々、そして愛する人を失った和光だったが、そんな彼の前に現れたのは…！？
description.vi: Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi nhân vật chính, Wakou Ichiro về nhà sớm để kỷ niệm 2 năm ngày cưới với vợ mình. Nhưng bất ngờ khi mở cửa ra thì... Anh phát hiện vợ mình đang làm tình với người đàn ông khác. Cuộc hôn nhân dù ngắn nhưng cũng làm cuộc sống của anh thay đổi một lần nữa. Bất ngờ một cô gái xuất hiện trước mặt anh, câu truyện vừa hài vừa lứng sẽ bắt đầu?
description.es-la: La historia empieza con el protagonista, Wakou Ichiro, quien decida regresar temprano a casa del trabajo para celebrar su segundo aniversario con su esposa. Pero, cuando abre la puerta de su casa... ¡Se encuentra a su esposa siéndole infiel! A pesar de que matrimonio duró muy poco, su vida vuelve a cambiar cuando de repente, frente a él se aparece cierta mujer... ¡Así comienza una nueva historia, una nueva comedía erótica!

altTitles.ja: 反抗できない！いばらちゃん

description.en: Hiiragi Ibara, who has now entered her second year of middle school has started her rebellious phase, becoming a problem child who troubles her brother… or so it appears. In truth, all she wants is her brother's attention.

altTitles.th: สมุดโน๊ตกระชากวิณญาณ

altTitles.ja: DEATH NOTE
デスノート

description.en:
A shinigami, as a god of death, can kill any person—provided they see their victim's face and write their victim's name in a notebook called a Death Note. One day, Ryuk, bored by the shinigami lifestyle and interested in seeing how a human would use a Death Note, drops one into the human realm.  
  
High school student and prodigy Light Yagami stumbles upon the Death Note and—since he deplores the state of the world—tests the deadly notebook by writing a criminal's name in it. When the criminal dies immediately following his experiment with the Death Note, Light is greatly surprised and quickly recognizes how devastating the power that has fallen into his hands could be.  
  
With this divine capability, Light decides to extinguish all criminals in order to build a new world where crime does not exist and people worship him as a god. Police, however, quickly discover that a serial killer is targeting criminals and, consequently, try to apprehend the culprit. To do this, the Japanese investigators count on the assistance of the best detective in the world: a young and eccentric man known only by the name of L.
description.kk: Иәгами Лайт — үлкен болашағы бар оқушы және ол іші пысқаннан шаршап кетті. Бірақ оның бәрі ажал құдайы Рүк тастап кеткен Ажал Дәптерін тапқанда өзгереді. Есімі дәптерге жазылған кез келген адам өледі екен, енді Лайт дүниені зұлымдықтан тазарту үшін Ажал дәптерінің күшін пайдалануға ант етті. Алайда қылмыскерлер өле бастағанда, билік өлтірушіні іздеуге аты аңызға айналған детектив L-ді жібереді. L оның артынан аңди бастағанда, Лайт өзінің асыл мақсатынан ба... әлде өмірінен айырыла ма?
description.pt: A história gira em torno do estudante Yagami Raito que encontra por acaso o caderno de um "Shinigami", um "Deus da Morte, cujo nome é Death Note". Raito/Light percebe que ao escrever o nome de alguém no caderno, a pessoa literalmente morre, assim, ele pretende criar um mundo perfeito, um novo mundo.
description.ru: Ягами Лайт — образцовый 17-летний выпускник, баллы за экзамены которого находятся в первых строках рейтинга всей Японии. Сидя на уроке, он замечает, что за окном что-то упало. На перемене он поднимает загадочный предмет и им оказывается черная тетрадь с надписью «Тетрадь смерти». Внутри была инструкция по использованию: «Человек, имя которого будет записано в тетради, умрет». Имея свои взгляды на систему наказания, Лайт решает установить собственное правосудие, использовать тетрадь для «очищения» мира от зла — убивать преступников.Когда действия Лайта становятся заметны для мирового правительства, на след неуловимого «Киры» (так мир окрестил нового мессию, решившего искоренить зло на планете) выходит детектив мирового класса, называющий себя «L», который поставил себе цель — разоблачить убийцу.
description.pt-br: Sem nada de interessante para fazer no Mundo dos Shinigamis, o Deus da Morte Ryuk deixa cair intencionalmente na Terra o seu Death Note.O caderno possui poderes macabros: a pessoa que tem seu nome escrito nele, morre! O Death Note acaba indo parar na mão de Light Yagami. Aluno exemplar, porém entediado, ao descobrir os sinistros poderes do caderno negro, ele decide virar um justiceiro e varrer a criminalidade da face da Terra. As seguidas mortes de criminosos em vários países diferentes acabam chamando a atenção da Interpol, que, por sua vez, pede ajuda ao maior detetive do mundo, conhecido apenas por "L", para resolver o caso. Inicia-se assim um frenético jogo de gato e rato entre Light e seu perseguidor implacável , enquanto Ryuk diverte-se com os acontecimentos que se desenrolam em decorrência do uso do Death Note.

description.en: Skylar has a secret hobby - taking photos of his crush, Chan-il. But when Cirrus stumbles upon Skylar's cloud storage with its impressive collection of Chan-il's photos, things escalate pretty quickly. At first confident his secret is safe with Cirrus, Skylar continuously finds himself in compromising situations, making him question Cirrus' true motives
description.uk:
У Ханиля є таємне хобі - фотографувати своє нерозділене кохання, Чаниля. Але коли Хьонун натикається на хмарне сховище Ханиля, з його вражаючою колекцією фотографій, ситуація досить швидко загострюється.
Чи збереже Хьонун секрет? Що він задумав?
description.pt-br: Skylar tem um hobby secreto - tirar fotos de sua paixão, Chan-il. Mas quando Cirrus se depara com o armazenamento de nuvem de Skylar com sua impressionante coleção de fotos de Chan-il, as coisas começam a andar muito rapidamente. A princípio confiante de que seu segredo está seguro com Cirrus, Skylar continuamente se encontra em situações comprometedoras, fazendo-o questionar os verdadeiros motivos de Cirrus.

description.en: The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

altTitles.en: The weirdo one desk over keeps giving me THAT kind of look

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

altTitles.ja: オトメの帝国

description.en: A peek into the "everyday nudity" of high school girls. Virgins’ Empire is a look into the lives of seven high school girls attending an all girls school. We follow them as they grow relationships with one another. Some more intimate than others.

title.en: Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro wa Wakaranai.

altTitles.ja: 数分後の未来が分かるようになったけど、女心は分からない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro ha Wakaranai.

altTitles.en: I Can Now See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Still Can't Understand a Woman's Heart.
I Can See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Don’t Know What a Woman's Mind Is Like

altTitles.id: Sekarang saya dapat melihat masa depan dalam beberapa menit, tetapi saya tidak dapat memahami hati seorang wanita.

altTitles.pt-br: Agora, posso ver alguns minutos no futuro, mas ainda não consigo entender o coração de uma mulher.

description.en: Arata Itou has the ability to see a few minutes into the future, but the glimpses he sees are always linked to misfortune. With his kind-hearted nature, Arata decides to use this inconvenient power to help girls facing various troubles and prevent their unfortunate futures. However, Arata doesn’t realize that, little by little, the girls are growing fond of him. And he remains oblivious to the quiet rivalries forming between them over his attention.
description.id: Arase Itou bisa melihat beberapa menit ke depan. Namun, masa depan yang ia lihat selalu berhubungan dengan masalah. Arase yang baik hati berusaha menghindari masa depan yang tidak menyenangkan ini, namun pada akhirnya masalah tersebut tetap membuatnya membantu berbagai gadis dengan masalah mereka. Tanpa ia sadari, para gadis mulai menyukainya. Arase tidak menyadari bahwa, diam-diam, para gadis bersaing untuk memperebutkannya.
description.ja:
伊藤新世は数分後の未来が分かる。ただし視える未来は不幸につながるもの。
お人好しな新世はそんな不都合な未来を回避し、様々な悩みを持つ少女を助けることになる。
新世は知らない。いつの間にか、少女たちに好かれていることに。
新世は気づかない。人知れず、少女たちが争っていることに。
description.pt-br: Arata Itou tem a habilidade de ver alguns minutos no futuro, mas as visões que ele tem estão sempre ligadas a infortúnios. Com seu coração bondoso, Arata decide usar esse poder inconveniente para ajudar as garotas que enfrentam diversos problemas e evitar seus futuros infelizes. No entanto, Arata não percebe que, pouco a pouco, as garotas começam a se afeiçoar a ele. E ele continua alheio às rivalidades silenciosas que estão se formando entre elas por causa da sua atenção.

altTitles.th: พบกันต์ ณ ที่รัก

description.en: "Pob Phanat," a renowned solo female artist with an impeccable reputation. However, deep in her heart, Pob has been longing for her first love that faded away many years ago. And that love is "Kan, Kan Thiwa," who once promised to become a singer alongside her. One day, Pob encounters Kan again... as a flower shop owner and a single mother?"

Even he, Kang Geon-woo, a genius major leaguer who gained wealth, fame, and everything, could not continue a happy married life with his wife. He, who felt regretful about his wife's absence, returned to the past with the power of a mysterious ring.

As a high school student in the midst of a fresh romance, will he be able to find love this time?

altTitles.th: สนามเด็กล่า

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Sensação de Diversão com seus brinquedos

description.en:
Lee Myung-jun, the Vice Chairman of Hyundo Group, lost his daughter to a group of bullies. Seeking revenge, he adopts Yoon Karma, a psychopathic defector girl.

Yoon Karma: A sadistic human weapon created through drug experiments in North Korea. After killing everyone in the research lab, she escaped to South Korea on her own.

Having just been released from a juvenile detention center in South Korea, Yoon Karma sets out to hunt down the bullies at school, driven by the desire to avenge her new father and satisfy her sadistic pleasures.
description.pt-br:
Lee Myung-jun, o vice-presidente do grupo Hyundo, perdeu sua filha para um grupo de pessoas que faziam bullying. Buscando vingança, ele adota Yoon Karma, uma garota desertora psicopata.
Yoon Karma: Uma arma humana sádica criada por meio de experimentos com drogas na Coreia do Norte. Depois de matar todos no laboratório de pesquisa, ela escapou para a Coreia do Sul sozinha.
Tendo acabado de ser libertada de um centro de detenção juvenil na Coreia do Sul, Yoon Karma sai para caçar os valentões na escola, movida pelo desejo de vingar seu novo pai e satisfazer seus prazeres sádicos.

description.en: Shin Yoomyeong is an unknown actor who kept on chasing his dream despite playing minor roles for 15 years because of his weak presence. One day, he meets the Acting Spirit, Yeonghwi, who he signs a contract with, and begins to shine in his career. In fact, he was always an acting genius,  but he was overshadowed by his weak presence. He creates a perfect character for every work he takes and slowly raises to stardom. However, Yeonghwi, who he saw as his benefactor, starts to seem suspicious…

altTitles.ja: アンダーニンジャ

description.en: The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.

altTitles.ja: 花かがり

description.en:
Student yuri. You can read them separately, but they are somewhat tied together.

(source: Pixiv, translated)

1. Senpai and Kouhai (後輩と先輩)
2. That Girl at Cram School (塾のあの子)
3. A Hopeless Romantic Wants to Give Up on Love (恋をやめたい恋愛体質)
4. A Friend's Love (友人の恋)
5. Cheating and Atonement (浮気と償い)
6. The Day I Realized (気付いてしまった日)
7. 500 Times Over (500回繰り返す)
description.ja: 学生百合。単発でも読めるけど繋がってたりします。

title.en: Okiraku Ryoushu no Tanoshii Ryouchi Bouei ~Seisan-kei Majutsu de Na mo na Kimura wo Saikyou no Jousai Toshi ni~

altTitles.ja: お気楽領主の楽しい領地防衛～生産系魔術で名もなき村を最強の城塞都市に～

altTitles.en: Easygoing Territory Defense by the Optimistic Lord: Production Magic Turns a Nameless Village into the Strongest Fortified City

altTitles.th: หนูน้อยเจ้าแคว้นกับแผนพิทักษ์เมือง

altTitles.zh: 安闲领主的愉快领地防卫～以生产系魔术将无名小村打造成最强要塞都市～

description.en: A man was reincarnated as Van, a boy of noble birth, who grew up to become a child prodigy through hard work. But when it was discovered that he possessed "production magic," he was immediately relegated to a remote village. However, his magic, which was called useless, turned out to be truly extraordinary, capable of producing anything as long as he had the right ingredients! With the knowledge from his previous life and the overpowered magic, the small, poor village will grow to become into a great city.
description.ja:
公爵家四男のヴァンは二歳にして"神童"と称される少年だった。孤独に過ごした前世の記憶を持つ彼は、貴族至上主義の世界で誰とも分け隔てなく接し、多くの笑顔に囲まれて過ごすうち……

「このまま楽しい人生を謳歌しよう！」

そんな夢を見ていたが、八歳に授かった『生産魔術』により一変。攻撃魔法こそ至高と考える父に失格の烙印を押され、名もなき貧しき辺境の村に追いやられてしまう！ところが――

「楽しく暮らせる僕好みの場所にしてやる！」

description.en:
A world of constant war because we don't understand each other's differences.
A world where it is normal to hate and harm other species.
In this hellish world where blood is splashed and people kill and kill each other, how can a boy named Rito survive?
A medieval dark fantasy of humans and xenomorphs.
description.ko:
서로의 다름을 이해 못 해 끊임없는 전쟁이 벌어지는 세계.
타종을 혐오하고 해하는 것이 당연한 세계.
피가 튀고 서로가 죽고 죽이는
이 지옥 같은 세계에서 소년 '리토'는
과연 어떻게 살아남을 것인가.

인간과 이종족들이 벌이는 중세 다크 판타지

description.en: One day, Liu Hai happened upon a dilapidated magic book. When she imitated the wizard in the magic book to create a magic circle, she accidentally summoned a monster girl named Chi Liu. Chi Liu is the source of strength in the country of Chi. She had been imprisoned for a long time and finally managed to escape. While Liu Hai in the human world was experimenting with the magic circle, the two met...

Kang Hyeon, who was ashamed of his poor family, cut off ties with those around him and studied desperately to achieve success, but eventually he realized that his ideals were wrong.
To make matters worse, Hyeon, who has cancer, gets run over while trying to save someone who fell on the subway tracks, and returns to the past while listening to the melody of a symphony.
Hyeon, who was determined not to live the same life as before, realizes that he has tremendous musical talent...

altTitles.ja: マッチ売り

description.en: University student Kiyotaka Hirose finds a love letter tucked into the pages of a borrowed book. The intended recipient is a mystery, but the writer’s identity is clear: a fellow student who’s suddenly leaving Tokyo and heading back to his hometown. Hirose is determined to return the letter, and as he tries to do so he runs into a black-market match seller, Seiji Hanashiro. Drawn to each other at first sight, tangled up in destiny and their own feelings, the men see their lives turned upside down by a single love letter. The first volume of Sakae Kusama’s standalone series, Lost Letters.

altTitles.en: Embodiment of the Assassin in the Murim World

description.en:
The No.1 Hitman, Kim Gun, finds himself plunged into the world of martial arts due to a mysterious accident. To return to his original world, he must complete a mission called 'Martial Arts Conquest.'

With a total of 2 guns, Kim Gun's adventure to subdue the unfamiliar martial arts world begins.
description.ko:
No.1 킬러 김건은 의문의 사고로 무림 세계에 빠지게 되고
원래 있던 지구로 돌아가기 위해서는 '무림 제패'라는 임무를 완수해야 한다는 것을 알게 된다.

총 2자루와 함께 낯선 무림이란 세계를 평정하기 위한 김건의 모험이 시작된다.

description.en:
"Is this really Joseon?! But I still have lives to save!"

Baek Kang-hyuk, South Korea’s top genius surgeon, finds himself transported to the Joseon era after touching a mysterious painting. And of all times… right before the outbreak of the Imjin War!

title.en: Intaishita Ossan Kenjada ga Manadeshi ga Tsuihou Sarete Kita no de Shoushin Ryokou ni Tsureteiku ~Surouraifu na Tabi no Tsumori ga, Nazeka Sekai Saikyou no Shitei ni Natte Ita~

altTitles.ja: 引退したおっさん賢者だが愛弟子が追放されてきたので傷心旅行に連れて行く ～スローライフな旅のつもりが、なぜか世界最強の師弟になっていた〜

altTitles.en: A Retired Old Sage Takes His Disciple on a Journey

description.en: “Shall we, go on an adventure like in the old days?” Although he was an orphan, Roge trained hard and became known as the “Sage.” His beloved student, Liliane, suddenyly came to visit him. “Roge-sensei… I… have been expelled.” Liliane has been employed as a royal court mage, but after being exhausted by the harsh working environment and shady human relationships, she was fired without being told why. In an attempt to heal her exhausted heart, Roge invites her on an adventure to relieve her heartbreak. “Sensei, I want to travel with you, to relive those bright days once again!” And so begins a slow-pace journey, following the paths they once travelled together, but the two, who are both too talented for their own good, end up leaving legends behind in every place they went…

altTitles.ja: 鬼畜島

description.en: University students shipwrecked and forced to board a deserted island with a serial killer.

Jongli Chu, a warrior of the Death Heavenly Sect who killed Hwang Jung to avenge his older brother. In order to avoid the pursuit of Death Heavenly Sect, he looked to an assassin of the Death Soul Agency, Crimson Assassin, for help and got swept into a huge mess known as the Obliteration. In order to escape the shadow of the Obliteration, he had no choice but to become a legendary Death God! Can Jong Lichu become a Death God and find freedom in the stifling rules created by the orthodox sects?

altTitles.ja: ストランド

description.en: Four high school classmates, not exactly close friends, share moments that are both fun and irreplaceable, yet tinged with a quiet heartache they don’t even realize. 'It feels like time has stopped.' Youth is both vibrant and muted. These are the daily lives of high schoolers—and the strange twists in between. A story that explores the meaning of a small act of courage in an unconventional coming-of-age drama (Anti-Electric Parade) begins!

The 72 Demon Kings, who received the order to destroy the earth, each went through a trial by the Great Demon King Astrea. Those who passed the trial earned the title of Demon King, and each Demon King was granted special powers by the Great Demon King.

So far, each Demon King had been granted extraordinary abilities. When Karos became a Demon King, he received a power from the Great Demon King, but… 

“Great Demon King, no matter how much I think about it, there is a problem with my power.”
“Problem?”

Among the Demon Kings with extraordinary abilities… Karos received the [Gacha] ability. 

“Gacha as the power of a Demon King? How am I supposed to rule the world with Gacha?!'”

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

description.en:
Robin is an ordinary high school student in South Korea.

On his way home from school as usual, an air raid warning sounds throughout the city, and an unidentified 'thing' takes away Robin's ordinary daily life.

Robin gets caught up in the fight between the 'monster', a being forgotten by humans for a long time, and the 'nameless unit' that protects humans... 

What the heck, this is scary!
description.ko:
대한민국의 평범한 고등학생 로빈.

평소와 다름 없던 하교길 도중, 도시 전역에 공습 경보가 울려 퍼지고정체 불명의 '그것'은 평범했던 로빈의 일상을 송두리째 앗아 간다.

오랜 시간동안 인간들에게 잊혀졌던 존재 '괴이'와 인간을 지키는 '무명대'의 싸움에로빈은 휘말리게 되는데... 뭐야, 이거 무서워!

altTitles.ja: 魔法先生ネギま！

altTitles.th: คุณครูจอมเวท เนกิมะ!

description.en:
Ten-year-old prodigy Negi Springfield, has just graduated from magic academy, and in order to become a master mage he is sent to Japan to teach English at an all-girls middle school. But Negi has a bigger dream than just becoming a master mage. He wants to find his missing father, "The Thousand Master", the strongest mage that has ever lived. And he soon finds that searching for his father wont be as easy as he first hoped. In fact, it pushes him and his students into life-or-death battles that decides the fate of millions.

---

Alternate official English:
- [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/193)

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: おとぎぶっ殺シアム

description.en:
"Granma didn't tell' em like that..."

Everyone has a favorite hero from their fairy tales, but who's the strongest of them all!?

This is a tale of death and rebirth. In order to accomplish their dream, hopes, wishes, revenge and salvation, the heroes of classic fairy tales will engage in a duel to death!

The warriors are resurrected and summoned to the Nightmare Coliseum by a mysterious monster who calls himself "Grimm P." and he promises the ultimate prize "You can resurrect anyone you want and live happily ever after"

This tournament is filled with bloody carnage, if you want to win, you better toss common sense out of the way because it is not needed.





This is a dark fantasy battle action manga where bizarre characters from fairy tales come to life. Legends like Red Riding Hood, Snow White, Pinocchio, and Beauty and the Beast engage in surrealistic killing matches. Right of the bat, we have Son Goku versus Momotaro!



32 characters will engage in sudden transformations, bloody battles, and tragic stories that will keep you on the edge of your seat.



Sure grandma didn't tell 'em like that!!

altTitles.ja: 亡びの国の征服者
亡びの国の征服者～魔王は世界を征服するようです～

altTitles.ja-ro: Horobi no Kuni no Seifukusha: Maou wa Sekai wo Seifukusuru Youdesu

altTitles.en: The Conqueror From a Dying Kingdom
The Demon King Seems to Conquer the World

altTitles.uk: Король Демонів - Підкорювач мертвої землі, - здається, завойовує світ

altTitles.zh-hk: 亡國的征服者～魔王將征服世界～

altTitles.ja-ro: Horobi no Kuni no Seifukusha: Maou wa Sekai wo Seifuku suru you desu

description.en:
Never having known the warmth of family, he was reborn in another world. Named Yuri, he is doted on by his parents and lives a new life in peace – as it should be. However, the country where Yuri and the others live is threatened by the “other humans” who dominate the vast expanse of the continent and is in danger of dying. Yuri and his family can’t stay out of it and are caught in the middle of the war… The Knights' House, the sword of the kingdom that wields a lance and kakedori birds. The death of his uncle, who was the leader of the Hovu family, brings Yuri’s father back to the world of knights, who had left the house to hate killing each other. Yuri is forced to attend the Knights’ Academy, where knights are trained, and the encounter there will drastically change the fate of Yuri and the kingdom. This is the story of a man who fights for the people he loves and later became known throughout the world as the “Demon King.”

---
As a self-professed no-lifer, Yuri idles his days away in front of a computer. This all changes the moment his life in Japan comes to an abrupt end and he finds himself reborn in the strange new world of the Shiyalta Kingdom. His new life includes everything he once lacked: loving parents, a comfortable home, and a promising future breeding and raising birds on his dad’s ranch. For centuries, the kingdom he now calls home has enjoyed peace and prosperity, shielded by friendly nations that, like Shiyalta itself, were established with the collapse of a once-great empire. War is a distant problem, relevant only to Shiyalta’s ruling families whose warriors periodically set out to join the fighting upon massive birds trained by Yuri’s dad and others. But this peaceful existence can’t last forever. Something rotten lies at the heart of the kingdom, and it doesn’t take someone with Yuri’s exceptional intelligence to realize that those distant battles will only remain irrelevant for so long.
description.ja: 世間に見放された孤独な男は、異世界に転生を果たす。ユーリと名付けられた男は、前世で与えられなかった”家族愛”に戸惑うも、新たな生に希望を見出しつつあった。だが、異種族の侵略を受け戦火は彼と家族の間近にまで迫り!? ユーリは家族のため終わりなき戦いへ身を投じる――。後に世界に名を轟かす男が歩んだ覇道の物語、ここに開幕。
description.uk: Людина, що залишила світ наприкінці своєї самотності, перетворилася на немовля Юрі. Хвиля “сімейної любові”, що обрушилася на нього, якої він не був обдарований у минулому житті, збиває його з пантелику, але він знаходить у своєму новому житті надію... Проте з початком вторгнення іншої раси, полум'я війни насувається на нього та його родину. І для того, щоб захистити своїх близьких, Юрі змушений кинутися до низки нескінченних битв. Чи впорається він?! Тут починається історія про переможний шлях людини, чиє ім'я пізніше прогримить на весь світ.
